title: Acid
brief_description: Presents varying ideas about LSD as expressed by users, former users, scientists and experts. Considers the extensive research now in progress, the recent discoveries about the physiological and psychological effects, and possible therapeutic uses. Psychedelic slides by Don Snyder. Song “Acid” written by Art Ciocco, performed and arranged by Tony Luisi.
